name: Boxxer Phone-Email-FAX Extractor Free
short_description: Extract unlimited email ids, phone/fax numbers from internet search engines, websites, local files, MSSQL or MySql databases, any email accounts etc based on given keywords. Remove invalid emails using built-in email verifier. Send bulk emails to the extracted list using bulk email sender add on app.
summary: Extract Unlimited email ids, phone/fax numbers from internet
